org.anchoranalysis.core.functional

Class FunctionalProgress

  • Object
    • FunctionalProgress

  • public class FunctionalProgress
extends Object
    Utilities for updating a Progress in a functional way
    Author:
    Owen Feehan

    • Method Summary

      Maps a list to new list, updating a progress-reporter for every element
      static <S,T,E extends Exception>

    • Method Detail

      • mapList

        public static <S,T,E extends Exception> List<T> mapList(List<S> list,
                                                        Progress progress,
                                                        CheckedFunction<S,T,E> mapFunction)
                                                 throws E extends Exception
        Maps a list to new list, updating a progress-reporter for every element
        Type Parameters:
        S - input-type to map
        T - output-type of map
        E - exception that can be thrown by mapFunction
        Parameters:
        list - the list to map
        progress - the progress-reporter to update
        mapFunction - the function to use for mapping
        Returns:
        a newly-created list with the result of each mapped item
        Throws:
        E - if the exception is thrown during mapping
        E extends Exception

      • mapListOptional

        public static <S,T,E extends Exception> List<T> mapListOptional(List<S> list,
                                                                Progress progress,
                                                                CheckedFunction<S,Optional<T>,E> mapFunction)
                                                         throws E extends Exception
        Maps a list to a new list, including only certain items, updating a progress-reporter for every element

        Items where the mapping returns Optional.empty() are not included in the outputted list.

        Type Parameters:
        S - input-type to map
        T - output-type of map
        E - exception that can be thrown by mapFunction
        Parameters:
        list - the list to map
        progress - the progress-reporter to update
        mapFunction - the function to use for mapping
        Returns:
        a newly-created list with the result of each mapped item
        Throws:
        E - if the exception is thrown during mapping
        E extends Exception
